data.title: strange small sparkles not steel wool!

data.text:
Posted: 25th Aug 2009

Charcoal? How would that work then?

'We're all mad here. I'm mad, you're mad." [said the Cat.]

"How do you know I'm mad?" said Alice.

"You must be," said the Cat, "Or you wouldn't have come here."

- Lewis Carroll, Alice's Adventures In Wonderland

Posted: 25th Aug 2009

Originally Posted By: VorutaOriginally Posted By: Fearpig

You could always ask them!

no, they won't answer, they hiding it like a mystery

Ah, glad to see they've embraced the spirit of poi >_<

The existance of flamethrowers says that someone, somewhere, at sometime said "I need to set that thing on fire, but it's too far away."
